title: NASA X-ray instrument finds black holes act like 'cosmic seesaws' shaping the universe
description: "We're seeing what could be described as an energetic tug-of-war inside the black hole's accretion flow."
content: "We're seeing what could be described as an energetic tug-of-war inside the black hole's accretion flow."
